zealiconProjects.name: Zealicon Website
desc: An annually themed digital hub for Zealicon, the Techno-Cultural Extravaganza at JSSATEN!

zealiconProjects.name: Sherlocked
desc: Sherlocked is a grueling online web based event played annually in Zealicon, where the participant has to solve the brainstorming questions to go ahead.

zealiconProjects.name: Loot
desc: An android application available on Play Store based on live location tracking. It's an annual event in Zealicon.

collegeProjects.name: JSS Infotech
desc: A digital hub of knowledge, bringing you updates on notices, assignments, and placement opportunities.

collegeProjects.name: MCQ Module
desc: Picture this: an online theater for teachers and societies, where multiple-choice questions take the stage and the results pop up like magic tricks! Abracadabra, learning just got a whole lot snazzier!

collegeProjects.name: Event Manager
desc: A college event-tracking web app, keeping students informed about daily happenings on campus. Stay in the loop, never miss out!

collegeProjects.name: Know Your College
desc: 'Know Your College', is a nifty web application that's your virtual compass for navigating the expansive world of JSS. It's your go-to guide for unraveling the intriguing corners of the college and its lively neighborhood.

collegeProjects.name: Code Pad
desc: An online IDE (compiler) for running programs in C, C++, Python, Java with frequent questions to solve.

collegeProjects.name: Plexus
desc: It is an online platform to host all kinds of digital events like Quizes etc. without any friction or technical know-how.

collegeProjects.name: Registration Module
desc: A platform for registration of students with record of their Unique IDs for various events like Zealicon.

collegeProjects.name: T & P Portal
desc: An online portal for managing & automating the recruitment procedure for T&P Centre.

collegeProjects.name: JSS Infotech App
desc: An application version of the JSS Infoconnect mentioned above for Android devices.
